scenario_text.value:
Oh no, what should I do...? I don’t have any
bandages or anything!

We should at least wash the wound for now.
Here, use my water.

I’m happy you’re worried about me too, Lady
Miu.
No... But I haven’t done anything...
Your feelings are enough for me, Lady Miu.

Oh, right... You should take this. I hope it
can be of use to you.
Are...are you sure I can have this?
Patamon wants you to have it, Miu!
Okay, I got it! Thank you.
We have to go on ahead, but you rest here.

Lady Miu, everyone... Thank you. I leave the
rest to you...
